Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a device that connects two people for communication.
The student can depict the device using a string to show how sound travels between two students.
The student can illustrate the two students at a distance, demonstrating the concept of communicating over long distances.
The student can include labels or explanations showing how the device uses sound to work.
The student can utilize the provided materials in their depiction to demonstrate they built the device.
The student can describe in their drawing how this device helps people communicate over distances.
